name: Samarium
educationalNotes: Samarium cobalt magnets are incredibly strong and temperature-stable! Samarium-cobalt used in military applications (jets, satellites). Samarium-153 is nuclear medicine isotope for bone pain. Samarium oxide used in optical coatings. Laser with samarium ions operates at infrared wavelengths. Discovered in 1879. Named after mineral samarskite. Samarium monopnictides have interesting magnetic properties. Used in high-temperature applications.
